messages.messageBody:
I assume that you are referring to Moses at http://www.nihontoantiques.com/

Having known him for nearly a dozen years I'd say without reservation he is
most trustworthy.


Sincerely Yours,

Michael Harris

From: Allan Schrattenholz [mailto:apschrattenholz@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 2004 9:53 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] NIHONTO ANTIQUES?


Hi All.
It is definately not to be rude or unpolite, but I would like to ask the
´group whether NIHONTO ANTIQUES can be trusted regarding quality,
reliability as well on buying and transferring money. I have never heard
anything bad about them but want to get the groups opinion before buying
something.
Thankyou so much for your help.
All the best
Allan

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] NIHONTO ANTIQUES?
messages.msgSnippet: hello all i have dealt with moses becerra of nihonto antiques for over 2 years now and he is the one of the most trustworthy persons i have dealt with
messages.messageBody:
hello all
i have dealt with moses becerra of nihonto antiques for over 2 years now and he is the one of the most trustworthy persons i have dealt with regarding buying swords and restoration services.he gives an inspection period on all his blades.i also have had a number of blades i wanted to have polished that he looked over for me and recomended that i should not waste the money on certain blades.he has saved me a lot time and money in my dealings with him. my 2 cents hope this helps.

john white

Thankyou so much for your help.
All the best
Allan
